section.title: Overview
section.p: SM delivers the following key features:

li.p: SM is a common point of presence for provisioning of SPS network elements. It provides REST and GUI to the service provider Operation, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) network.
SM is the provisioning GUI for SPS.
SM is the API gateway for all clients.
SM is the router for these API requests and selects the ME to forward the requests.
SM provides high scalability, local redundancy or High-Availability (HA) and geo-redundancy.
SM allows management of SM operators, their roles and administration settings.
